title: OnePose++: Keypoint-Free One-Shot Object Pose Estimation without CAD Models

AutoRecon: Automated 3D Object Discovery.ref_texts: [11] Xingyi He, Jiaming Sun, Yuang Wang, Di Huang, Hujun Bao, and Xiaowei Zhou. Onepose++: Keypoint-free one-shot object pose estimation without CAD models. In NeurIPS , 2022. 4, 8
AutoRecon: Automated 3D Object Discovery.1: It can recover the complete geometry of foreground objects, even the low-textured ones, which is discussed in [11].
AutoRecon: Automated 3D Object Discovery.2: The reconstruction quality of SfM point clouds can be further improved with refinement methods like [11, 17], which can further improve the quality of surface reconstruction and potentially eliminate reconstruction ambiguities.

Long-term Visual Localization with Mobil.ref_texts: [26] Xingyi He, Jiaming Sun, Yuang Wang, Di Huang, Hujun Bao, and Xiaowei Zhou. Onepose++: Keypoint-free one-shot object pose estimation without CAD models. In NeurIPS , 2022. 2, 4, 5
Long-term Visual Localization with Mobil.1: In the second stage, inspired by the recent CADfree object pose estimation method, OnePose++ [26], we design a transformer-based network to directly match 3D points of the retrieved sub-map to dense 2D pixels of the query photo in a coarse-to-fine manner.
Long-term Visual Localization with Mobil.2: As for the time-consumption issue, inspired by recent 6-DoF pose estimation works [26,61], we aim to directly match 3D sub-map and 2D query image in one-shot with selfand cross-attention modules.
Long-term Visual Localization with Mobil.3: Similar to [26, 60], we first use positional encoding to augment the features {˜F2D,˜F3D}, resulting in {˜Fpe 2D,˜Fpe 3D}.
Long-term Visual Localization with Mobil.4: Following [26, 60], we supervise the network by a focal loss [38] for coarse matching and variance-weighted ℓ2 loss for fine refinement.
